segments.text: I am sorry to have kept all of you waiting . I was delayed by something urgent .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You are not late , Mr . Thomas . There're still 15 minutes to go . Mr . White has just called you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: He said there was a traffic jam , but he is coming .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: He shouldn't drive his car . He should come here by bus .
segments.speaker: S1
